titleStmt.title: Sale of wine in advance [between 200 and 211]

msContents.summary: Two papyrus copies of a sale of 151 wine jars of wine in advance from the Oxyrhynchites (Oxyrhynchite Nome), Egypt. Dated to Phaophi 29 of year 9-20 of Septimius Severus, Caracalla and Geta (October 26 or 27, A.D. 200-211). Delivery takes place in Mesore (late July through most of August). The seller, a son of Thaisous, is also the lessee of the buyer's vineyard near Senepta(?). The buyer is from Oxyrhynchos. Ptolemaios signs for the seller

msItem.note: Dimensions of fragments are 11.3 x 7.4 cm. or smaller
Written along the fibers on the recto, the subscription in a different hand
Upper margin of 1.5 cm. on one fragment; lower margin of 1 cm., left margin of 1.5 cm., and right margin of 1 cm. on the other fragment

supportDesc.support: 1 item : papyrus, twelve partly joining fragments mounted in glass, incomplete
